attributes.action: David Cameron v Nigel Farage to debate the EU in out vote, on prime time TV
attributes.additional_details:
David Cameron threatened his MP if they campaign to come out they would be sacked.
The in out EU vote, threatens our countries freedom and democracy and the public have the right to "true" facts which David Cameron is hiding ! And indeed lying about !
attributes.background: Our countries freedom democracy and indeed sovereignty is threatened, the "TRUE FACTS" need to be exposed.  David Cameron is not being transparent and needs to be exposed ! The European Union is not a democracy at all but an extremely clever deception strategy devised by Germanies top men in 1942.

rejection.details: It would be for the broadcasters to decide whether to broadcast this debate, and for Mr Farage to decide whether he wanted to take part.
